sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. In a rice cooker or pot, combine jasmine rice, coconut milk, water, salt, and sugar. 2. Cook rice according to rice cooker instructions or bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15-20 until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed. 3. Fluff rice with a fork. 4. Garnish with toasted sesame seeds before serving.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type/> <name>Thai Coconut Rice</name> <nutrition>Calories: 200, Protein: 3g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Rinse jasmine rice. 2. Toast sesame seeds.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4a5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afe1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
